titleStmt.title: Maroccus extaticus. Or, Bankes bay horse in a trance A discourse set downe in a merry dialogue, betweene Bankes and his beast: anatomizing some abuses and bad trickes of this age. Written and intituled to mine host of the Belsuage, and all his honest guests. By Iohn Dando the wierdrawer of Hadley, and Harrie Runt, head ostler of Bosomes Inne.
titleStmt.author: Dando, John.
Runt, Harrie. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Thomas Scarlet] for Cuthbert Burby,

notesStmt.note: John Dando and Harrie Runt are pseudonyms.
Running title reads: Bankes bay horse in a trance.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
